Hi Leff,
This page may be helpful to you:
https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/=
display/Heritrix/Configuring+Crawl+Scope+Using+DecideRules

If you mean tha=
t you want to stay on your seeds' domains but include embedded images no ma=
tter the domain, your use case is pretty common. In your decide rules (Deci=
deRuleSequence), you will probably want to include at least the following t=
hree rules:
1. Start with a  RejectDecideRule to tell the crawler you only =
want to accept URIs fitting the rules to follow.
2. Use a rule such as OnDo=
mainsDecideRule  or SurtPrefixedDecideRule  to accept the URIs from your de=
sired domain set.
3. Use a TransclusionDecideRule somewhere after the above=
 two rules to allow inclusion of embedded resources such as images.

If tha=
t is not exactly what you are trying to do, and you need to provide further=
 inclusion of images or exclusion of certain embedded resources, you might =
do something with a MatchesFilePatternDecideRule to match URIs that are lik=
ely to be certain types.

Lauren Ko
Programmer
UNT Libraries

Hi everyone !

I hope i post this question in the good place..

I trying t=
o use Heritrix in order to crawl a list of websites (seeds), but must not g=
o out of the domain, except to gather images. I didn't find how to configur=
e Heritrix in order to do that, I googled it in many (wrong?) ways...

Can =
someone give me a clue?

Leff.
